title: Can Carolina Beach State Park do just enough work now to open the ramps back up? Thanks for your time, Donnie Pye.
text:
Here's a link to an answer we did explaining the work. But in
short, no, they will only open them up when they feel the work is
complete. We urge you to contact park officials for more details.



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=2577
